sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>flood</radical> and a <radical>fire</radical>! At the same time? This is a <kanji>disaster</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Imagine a disaster so bad that there are floods AND fires. That's too much!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>disaster</kanji> was caused by your <reading>cy</reading>borg (<ja>さい</ja>)! It's malfunctioning, running around leaking large amounts of water and breathing fire. I guess you didn't work out all the kinks before you let it roam wild.
readingInfo: You better figure out a way to stop your cyborg from causing more disasters like this. Fix it now, or you're gonna be in big trouble.
